signin.start-chat: Create an account and start your chat journey!

setting.space_06: After logging off, you will not be able to retrieve your account information, and all your data and messages will be deleted.

identity.space_05: Create your own character card to continue chatting
identity.space_11: Set as default for all chats
identity.space_17: Avatars can be in a variety of formats, including webp, png, and jpeg, with webp being the best. It is recommended to upload a 1:16 or 3:4 image from which to extract a (512x512) avatar. Images should be less than 10MB.
identity.space_33: After switching the current character card, the chat memory of the previous character will be cleared
identity.space_35: After deleting the current character card, it will not affect existing sessions
identity.space_40: You haven't bound your character card yet. You can get the best chat experience after binding.

nsfw.space_3: You may see sensitive or adult content that may not be suitable for everyone. To view this content, please confirm your age

vipPopover.space_6: Up to 16k memory, ultra-fast chat speed
vipPopover.space_7: Dedicated chat capacity with basic priority

task.space_104: Complete corresponding tasks to obtain diamond rewards. Diamonds can be used to unlock character dialogues.
task.space_106: Just log in to your account daily to claim. The more you persist, the more you accumulate!
task.space_108: Share the MYLUNA experience with your friends and invite them to join. Both you and your friends will receive rewards when they interact on the platform!
task.space_202: Register and log in through the invitation link sent by your friends to claim
task.space_206: Sign in daily and get Myluna diamonds
task.space_213: Invite your friends to enter your code within 24 hours after registration
task.space_214: Note: New users can only use 1 invitation code, and one invitation code can invite up to 10 new users
task.space_302: Share the MYLUNA experience with your friends and invite them to join. When they interact on the platform, both you and your friends will get rewards.
task.space_306: A magical machine has come to your class that will answer all your questions: you try to befriend it
task.space_308: After a new user registers, you can claim 50 diamonds as an invitation reward

metadata.description: Discover the best unfiltered NSFW AI chat experiences. Chat with custom AI characters in unrestricted hentai and NSFW conversations. Join MyLuna.VIP now!

chat.generate-image-tooltip: Click to generate an image. Each time costs 100 diamonds. Supreme members can generate images unlimitedly.

diamondProducts.space2: Diamonds can be used to purchase characters.

deleteAccountDialog.content: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to retrieve account information, and all your data and messages will be deleted as well.
